title: "Monahans City"

## Import 

Same process as before


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
monahans <- read_excel("data-raw/MonahansCity.xls")

monahans |> glimpse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 98
Columns: 7
$ date_arrest    <chr> "1/31/2018", "2/5/2018", "2/9/2018", "2/14/2018", "2/23…
$ name           <chr> "TALANO, ELIZABETH ROCHELLE", "REYES, GABRIEL VILLESCAS…
$ race_sex       <chr> "W/F", "H/M", "B/M", "B/F", "B/F", "H/F", "H/M", "H/F",…
$ age            <dbl> 18, 24, 23, 37, 43, 23, 18, 19, 35, 37, 27, 38, 18, 17,…
$ address_arrest <chr> "1210 E SEALY APARTMENT 108", "200 BLK W 10TH", "100 BL…
$ city_zip       <chr> "MONAHANS, TX 79756", "MONAHANS, TX 79756", "MONAHANS, …
$ charges        <chr> "POSS MARIJ <2OZ MB", "POSS MARIJ <2OZ MB", "POSS MARIJ…
```
:::
:::


## Clean

Change date_arrest to a date type and split race_sex column into two. 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
monahans_clean <- monahans |> mutate(
  race = substr(race_sex, 1, 1),
  sex = substr(race_sex, 3, 3),
  date_arrest = mdy(date_arrest)
  ) |> select( -race_sex, -city_zip) |> 
  cbind(datetime_arrest = NA, agency_arrest = NA, ethnicity = NA)

monahans_clean |> glimpse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 98
Columns: 10
$ date_arrest     <date> 2018-01-31, 2018-02-05, 2018-02-09, 2018-02-14, 2018-…
$ name            <chr> "TALANO, ELIZABETH ROCHELLE", "REYES, GABRIEL VILLESCA…
$ age             <dbl> 18, 24, 23, 37, 43, 23, 18, 19, 35, 37, 27, 38, 18, 17…
$ address_arrest  <chr> "1210 E SEALY APARTMENT 108", "200 BLK W 10TH", "100 B…
$ charges         <chr> "POSS MARIJ <2OZ MB", "POSS MARIJ <2OZ MB", "POSS MARI…
$ race            <chr> "W", "H", "B", "B", "B", "H", "H", "H", "B", "H", "H",…
$ sex             <chr> "F", "M", "M", "F", "F", "F", "M", "F", "M", "M", "M",…
$ datetime_arrest <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ agency_arrest   <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ ethnicity       <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
```
:::
:::



## Export


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
monahans_clean |> write_csv("data-processed/Monahans-City.csv")
```
:::
